results.title: Metformin's impact on delirium in diabetic cardio surgery patients.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use was associated with a significantly reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Emergence_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071257 @@@POD@@@ (adjusted odds ratio [aOR], 0.52; 95% confidence interval [CI], 0.40-0.67).

citations.NLM: Lu Z, Sun M, Chen WM, Lv S, Fu N, Yang Y, Wang Y, Miao M, Wu SY, Zhang J. Metformin's impact on delirium in diabetic cardio surgery patients. J Anesth. 2025 Apr 26;():. PMID: 40285872

results.title: Metformin Use in Type 2 Diabetics and Delirium After Noncardiac Surgery: A Retrospective Cohort Analysis.
results.text_hl: Logistic regression and generalized estimating equation models accounted for within-@SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ correlation across multiple surgeries and explored the association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and @<m>DISEASE_Emergence_Delirium</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071257 @@@postoperative delirium@@@ and complications.

citations.NLM: Paredes S, Harb A, Rössler J, Nikoo MZ, Ruetzler K, Turan A, Pu X, Sessler DI. Metformin Use in Type 2 Diabetics and Delirium After Noncardiac Surgery: A Retrospective Cohort Analysis. Anesth Analg. 2024 Mar 22;():. PMID: 38517762
